question: What is the campaign of the International Day of Yoga 2020, promoted by the AYUSH Ministry?
option1: Yoga at Home, Yoga with Family
answer: Yoga at Home, Yoga with Family
explanation:
International Day of Yoga is celebrated every year on June 21, across the world. The first such day was celebrated in the year 2015.
This year, Union AYUSH Ministry is promoting the practice of Yoga with the campaign ‘Yoga at Home, Yoga with Family’, through its various initiatives, as a part of the International Yoga Day Celebration on June 21. This year’s observance will highlight the health-building and stress-relieving aspects of Yoga.
